heading: Getting Started with AI
paragraph: Artificial Intelligence is transforming industries. Students explore its basic concepts including machine learning, neural networks, and real-world applications.
author: By Sector Team

heading: Understanding Data Structures
paragraph: Data structures like arrays, stacks, and trees are essential for programming. Students learn how to use them to organize and manage data efficiently.
author: By Sector Team

heading: What is Cloud Computing?
paragraph: Cloud computing enables access to computing resources via the internet. Students learn about services like IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS in modern tech stacks.
author: By Sector Team

heading: Introduction to Cybersecurity
paragraph: Cybersecurity protects systems from digital attacks. Students are introduced to encryption, firewalls, malware, and ethical hacking basics.
author: By Sector Team

heading: Why Learn Python?
paragraph: Python is versatile and beginner-friendly. Students start writing their first programs, working with syntax, variables, loops, and functions.
author: By Sector Team

heading: Basics of Web Development
paragraph: Learn the fundamentals of creating websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Students build their first responsive webpage.
author: By Sector Team

heading: Developing Mobile Apps
paragraph: Explore how mobile apps are built. Students learn the app lifecycle, UI design principles, and get introduced to Flutter and Dart.
author: By Sector Team

heading: Design Thinking in Engineering
paragraph: Design thinking helps solve complex problems with creativity. Students explore empathy, ideation, and prototyping through real-world scenarios.
author: By Sector Team

heading: Exploring Basic Electronics
paragraph: Students get hands-on with circuits, resistors, capacitors, and learn how electronic devices are built and function in daily life.
author: By Sector Team

heading: 3D Printing: Design to Reality
paragraph: Learn how 3D printing brings digital designs to life. Students explore modeling software and print custom prototypes.
author: By Sector Team
